elements.contents:
Levana Protocol - REKT
Friday, December 29, 2023

Levana Protocol - Osmosis - REKT

Gradually, then all at once. Levana Protocol lost over $1.1M to an oracle manipulation attack lasting almost two weeks. But if it hadn’t been for congestion, would they have even noticed?

MORE

Money for nothing?
Thursday, December 28, 2023

MEV - Uniswap - REKT

The cost of doing business? 98%. $1.3M was lost yesterday when a Uniswap V3 whale LP made a costly fat-finger error. Who deserves the spoils?

MORE

Ape Season Returns
Thursday, December 21, 2023

Ape Szn - Ledger - Thirdweb

The apes are out of their cages once more, but familiar dangers are ever-present. Each innovation spawns new ways to get rekt but, despite the risks, opportunity certainly is out there.

MORE

Hypr Network - REKT
Thursday, December 14, 2023

Hypr Network - Bridge - REKT

What is this, a bridge hack for ants? Yesterday, Hypr Network lost $220k to a bridge exploit. Forking code can be risky, especially when devs aren't up to date with issues in the source.

MORE

OKX DEX - REKT
Wednesday, December 13, 2023

OKX - REKT

CeDeFi strikes again. OKX’s DEX aggregator has fallen victim to one of the oldest tricks in the book, losing $2.7M to a private key compromise. If the compromised contract was deprecated, why did they wait until it got rekt?

MORE

Plenty of Phish
Wednesday, December 6, 2023

Phishing - Scams

The tide may be turning, but crypto’s waters remain as treacherous as ever. Our latest phishing roundup covers the latest tackle and the most tempting lures. Will you take the bait?

MORE

KyberSwap - REKT
Thursday, November 23, 2023

KyberSwap - REKT

OG decentralised exchange KyberSwap got rekt across six chains, for a total loss of over $48M. Perhaps there’s some good news in store for KyberSwap and LPs, or is the attacker just toying with us?

MORE

HECO Bridge, HTX - REKT
Wednesday, November 22, 2023

HECO Bridge - HTX - REKT

It's been a rough few weeks for Justin Sun. Today, another $99M went missing as HECO Bridge and HTX (again) were hacked in short succession. His Excellency makes sure to never stay out of the spotlight for long…

MORE

Kronos Research - REKT
Tuesday, November 21, 2023

Kronos Research - Woo X - REKT

Deja-vu, anyone? Market maker Kronos Research lost $26M over the weekend, leading to liquidity issues on closely-associated CEX Woo X. Where have we heard that before?

MORE

dYdX - REKT
Monday, November 20, 2023

dYdX - YFI - REKT

Weekend wipeout. dYdX lost 40% of its v3's insurance fund ($9M) in a ‘targeted attack' involving manipulation of Yearn’s YFI token. One exploit, two losers.

MORE

Raft - REKT
Sunday, November 12, 2023

Raft - REKT

Raft was raided by on-chain pirates for $3.3M on Friday, but the loot ended up falling overboard. When braving DeFi's stormy seas, we all must choose our vessel. Would you trust a Raft?

MORE

Poloniex - REKT
Friday, November 10, 2023

Poloniex - Justin Sun - CEX - REKT

Nothing like a nine-figure exchange hack to cool the pump-induced euphoria. Poloniex had its hot wallets drained of $126M today. How deep do Justin Sun's pockets go?

MORE
